Libvirt made easy

This page is a portal for easy navigation of the WebVirt suite's documentation, including setup & configuration, user instructions and details on the software & network architecture

User guide

WebVirt's feature set is simple and intutive, with a slick user-interface and useful features.

View guide >>

API Reference

The WebVirt application is built on RESTful API's to allow command line acces to important information.

View reference >>

Make it work!

WebVirt is easy to deploy, and easier to configure. This section provides full, step-by-step installation instructions.

View config & install >>

Can you run it?

WebVirt is lightweight, efficient and operates in parallel to whatever software is running next to, or on top of, Libvirt.

View prerequisites >>
